ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Misaligned traces can be aligned using alignment techniques

Description

Misaligned traces can be aligned using alignment techniques

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Cryptographic Algorithm Implementation (MITRE EMB3D PID-11)

Attack Vectors

SCA

Power Side-Channel (MITRE EMB3D TID-101)

Defenses

Randomize waveform shape, Current scrambling
